Suspected Violation Location.answer: at a construction site near the river

Responsible Party.answer: local company operating in the area

Is the suspected Violation still occurin.answer: still occurring (assessed by the investigating agency)

Violation Description.info: Include a detailed description of the violation. For example, gas drilling, drum dumping etc. If necessary, include specific directions.
Violation Description.answer: Improper disposal of hazardous waste materials, specifically dumping of drums containing chemicals into the river at the intersection of Main Street and Elm Avenue, near the local river. This endangers aquatic life, poses risk to local ecosystem and human health.

Reporter Contact Information.info: You are not required to provide your contact information but the EPA might want to reach out to you for additional information.
